Name: Outcore: Desktop Adventure
About the game: Befriend Lumi, a lost girl who lives on your desktop. Work together to recover her memories of who she is and why she appeared on your computer. Interact with your own computer to solve desktop puzzles and unlock memory files. Experience a story with the worst characters ever written. Fight the worst characters ever written. Sure, every game on Steam has a wishlist button. But is it as good as Outcore's wishlist button? Scientists have proved that clicking this wishlist button an uneven amount of times can increase your lifespan. Had fun with Outcore? Check out this game by my friend Kingblade /
